value.title: Use Custom Visuals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Watch how you can get customer visuals in Power BI from the marketplace, or use internal custom visuals that you may have within your organization.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://twitter.com/awsaxton -- http://twitter.com/patrickdba -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: Using DAX to format a list of values in Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: Alberto Ferrari joins Patrick to walk through how you can use DAX to format a list of values within Power BI Desktop. This takes the concatenate values quick measure to the next level.  Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/

value.title: Visually see where you BROKE the fold in Power Query
value.excerpt: Rule #1 - DON'T BREAK THE FOLD! There is an amazing feature that lets you see where this fold was broken, and I'm guessing you didn't even know it was there!  Adam shows you where to go.  Query plan for Power Query (Preview) https://learn.microsoft.com/power-query/query-plan  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: What tool do you use to optimize your Power BI dataset?
value.excerpt: Need some help optimizing your Power BI Dataset but don't want to hand over your Power BI Desktop file? value.title: What's a Junk Dimension and when should you use it?
value.excerpt: Maybe you've heard of the concept of a junk dimension but what exactly is it and when should you use it? Patrick breaks down this dimensional modeling concept.   Junk Dimensions https://www.kimballgroup.com/data-warehouse-business-intelligence-resources/kimball-techniques/dimensional-modeling-techniques/junk-dimension/

value.title: Where are the Power BI Gateway logs? I thought I knew...
value.excerpt: Do you know where the Power BI Gateway log files are? I didn't! I'll show you a tool I use to help figure something like this out. And also tell you where they are!  Process Monitor https://learn.microsoft.com/sysinternals/downloads/procmon  Rui Romano's Gateway Monitor Report https://github.com/RuiRomano/pbigtwmonitor

value.title: Why is there a limited relationship when using the same data source?

value.title: Why isn't my Agg hitting when using DISTINCTCOUNT in Power BI???
value.excerpt: Using Aggregations in Power BI? Have some DISTINCTCOUNT in your measures? Wondering why the queries are slow and not hitting the aggs? Patrick shows you what is going on! Get ready for some DAX fusion!  DAX Fusion: https://dax.tips/2019/08/05/dax-fusion/  Aggregations Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/transform-model/aggregations-advanced

value.title: Working with images in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to work with images in Power BI. He isn't talking about adding a logo into your report. This looks at how you can integrate visuals in your visuals based on your data.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube -- http://www.facebook.com/guyinacube

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it’s Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
